Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored a scintillating century, 112 not out off 51 balls
Sri Lanka was bundled out for 137 in 16.4 overs
Post-Match Reflections: India dominated the proceeding with both ball and bat in the decider, which is bound to boost the youngsters' morale.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar toyed with the Sri Lankan bowlers throughout, hitting fours and maximums at will
Arshdeep Singh (3/20) took three Sri Lankan wickets for India
Axar Patel (1/19) also put his name in the wicket-takers' list
